pages.name: page1
pages.title: New Progress View (beta) - Give Detailed Feedback
pages.description: Your feedback is invaluable in creating the best possible experience on Code.org. By filling out this survey, you'll help shape the continued improvement of the new progress view. We appreciate your input!

elements.name: overall_satisfaction
elements.title: Overall, how satisfied are you with the new progress view?

elements.name: version_preference
elements.title: Which version of the progress view are most likely to use going forward (new vs old)?

choices.text: 5 = Definitely stay with the new version
4 = Probably stay with the new version
2 = Probably stay with the old version
1 = Definitely stay with the old version

elements.name: like_the_most
elements.title: What do you like most about the new progress view?

elements.name: like_the_least
elements.title: What could be improved about the new progress view?

elements.name: issues_encountered
elements.title: Please describe any issues you encountered in the new progress view (if any).

elements.name: other_feedback
elements.title: Is there any other feedback you'd like to share?
